title: Year of the Goat Icon?
body:
Has anyone not received their Year of the Goat Icon? I mystery gifted the day before it was supposed to end but still have not received it :(

Or are we receiving them at a later date? Might need to {{summoner:4}} over to OCE Support and make a ticket.

***EDIT:*** I contacted support and they checked the gift date and added the icon :)

replies.body: I think going to submit a ticket is probably your best option. I haven't seen cases of anyone getting their icon here on the boards.
